pages.text: $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Linking-Pedestals%2C-and-Advanced-Uses)A pedestal powered by redstone/$ $(li)Cannot be sent Items, Exp, Energy, or Fluids.$(li)Will prevent its Upgrade from functioning.$(li)Will prevent being teleported to (if connected to a Teleporter upgraded pedestal)

Pedestals Emit Redstone when a comparator has been set to read its inventory. (Like any other inventory)$(li)You can create some custom routing situations with pedestals just using the redstone control.
